entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -27.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 12:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -27.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -32.9°C
Wind: WNW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22.
